title: Trump lets Little League baseball champions tag along on Air Force One
text:
President Donald Trump welcomed some last minute tag-alongs aboard his Air Force One trip to Louisiana on Friday evening, extending a surprise invitation to the Little League world champion Eastbank All Stars baseball team to catch a ride home in style.

The Jefferson Parish-based team was feted by Trump at the White House earlier Friday, and pictures from the team’s Facebook page show the middle-schoolers getting a tour of the Capitol and being hosted by Rep. Steve Scalise (R-La.), the House minority whip.

Story Continued Below
